title: Burnout
creator_credit: J. Gary Mitchell, John McDonald and M T I Teleprograms
brief_description: A series of dramatized sequences illustrate different types of ‘burnout’ that occur in work situations. Shows the frustrations which create it, varying responses and shows how communication combats burnout. Includes cameos from actor Pee Wee Herman as a therapist, pop star and french film actor.
